Title: The Assassin
Writer: Tonino Guerra (story), Elio Petri (story), Pasquale Festa Campanile (screenplay), Massimo Franciosa (screenplay), Tonino Guerra (screenplay), Elio Petri (screenplay)
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Micheline Presle, Cristina Gaioni, Salvo Randone
Plot: Alfredo Martelli is picked up by the police in his apartment without justification. In the precinct, he slowly discovers what is the investigation about as we find out details about his life.
